body_html:
Hi @rmlarsen,
I have added the longer comment about _bar you asked for.

@jameshensman has spent some time using flake8 on the unit test to ensure pep8 compliance which also covers your points on this. It turns out some of the rest of the script wasn't pep8 compliant so he fixed that too.

I you agree, I think that therefore means we are good to go. What happens next?

Thanks for all your help,
@alexggmatthews
